DOC.brief_summary: In single- blind clinical trial 67 primigravida female , gestational age 34-36 week select use multi-stage sampling assign two group randomly . Decision-making ( , two week admission maternity department ) test researcher -made questionnaire . In experiment group , advantage disadvantage normal delivery cesarean-section delivery present role-playing three 90-min scenario . It also present 90-min lecture . Data analyze use SPSS mean difference test , exact fisher test , independent t-test pair t-test .
DOC.criteria: primipara , single pregnancy , gestational age 3436 week , age 1835 year old , history infertility , indication cesarean section , pass educational course delivery method medical condition pregnant woman , diagnosis abnormal fetus / possibility delivery fetus sonography , abnormal volume amniotic fluid placenta
